name: Intro to git
text: Git bash is a Command line interface we can use to interface with files or directories within our computer. \n Git allow us to create a repository where we build projects. The ability to create, clone and push (upload) these repositories is key to how we collaborate & deploy code.
description: A breif intro to Git bash

name: Resolving Merge Conflicts
description: A short video on resolving merge conflicts using VS code

name: Gitbash Cheat sheet
description: A cheat sheet with some of your most used commands and how to use them

name: Official documentation
description: THe official Gitbash documentation, covering all the commands, features & syntax required for the Git package

name: Github tutorial
description: A tutorial into the basics of Git commands and how to use Github to act as a remote repository
